remarks: Non-closure: if one vector belongs to a subspace but another does not, their sum does not belong.  Useful for obtaining a new vector not in a subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2015.)
statement:
lssvancl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lssvancl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lssvancl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssvancl.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lssvancl.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lssvancl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
lssvancl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lssvancl.n $e |- ( ph -> -. Y e. U ) $.
lssvancl2 $p |- ( ph -> -. ( Y .+ X ) e. U ) $.
